Name: Research and Development
Description: Responsible for researching and developing new technologies and products in the field of AI and automation.

Name: Engineering
Description: Responsible for designing and building the products and solutions offered by ABC Labs.

Name: Sales and Marketing
Description: Responsible for promoting and selling ABC Labs' products and solutions to businesses and governments.

Name: Business Development
Description: Responsible for identifying and pursuing new business opportunities and partnerships.

Name: Operations
Description: Responsible for the day-to-day operations of the company, including logistics, supply chain management, and customer support.
